title: Inside Mandalay: BBC joins rescuers searching for earthquake dead in Myanmar
snippets: The BBC’s Yogita Limaye is the first foreign journalist to enter the country since the disaster struck.
summary: Yogita Limaye of the BBC has become the first foreign journalist to enter the country following a recent disaster, marking a significant moment in the coverage of the event.
titles: Inside Mandalay: BBC joins rescuers searching for earthquake dead in Myanmar

title: Gaza faces ‘largest orphan crisis’ in modern history, report says
snippets: Over 39,000 children have lost one or both parents in Gaza, new report by the Palestinian statistics agency says.
summary: A report from the Palestinian statistics agency reveals that over 39,000 children in Gaza have lost either one or both parents.
titles: Gaza faces ‘largest orphan crisis’ in modern history, report says

title: Deadly Israeli air attack on UNRWA clinic in Gaza
snippets: Al Jazeera’s Moath al-Kahlout reports on the aftermath of an Israeli attack on an UNRWA clinic.
summary: An Israeli attack targeted an UNRWA clinic, as reported by Al Jazeera's Moath al-Kahlout. The report covers the aftermath of the incident.
titles: Deadly Israeli air attack on UNRWA clinic in Gaza

title: World leaders criticise Trump tariffs as 'major blow'
snippets: EU chief Ursula von der Leyen says US tariffs will see "uncertainty spiral" as world leaders react to Trump's announcement.
summary: EU chief Ursula von der Leyen warns that US tariffs will lead to increased uncertainty globally, following President Trump's announcement. World leaders are responding to the new trade measures.
titles: World leaders criticise Trump tariffs as 'major blow'

title: Hungary withdraws from International Criminal Court during Netanyahu visit
snippets: The move is announced hours after Israel's PM, who is sought under an ICC arrest warrant, arrives in Budapest for a state visit.
summary: Israel's Prime Minister, who is subject to an International Criminal Court (ICC) arrest warrant, arrived in Budapest for a state visit. Hours after his arrival, an unspecified move related to the visit was announced.
titles: Hungary withdraws from International Criminal Court during Netanyahu visit

title: Breaking down NBA's great tank race for Cooper Flagg as top lottery positions come into focus
snippets: The Jazz, Hornets and Wizards will likely have 14% chances for the top pick, and the 76ers have positioned themselves well
summary: The Jazz, Hornets, and Wizards are each likely to have a 14% chance of securing the top pick in the upcoming draft, positioning them favorably. Additionally, the 76ers have also strategically positioned themselves well in relation to the draft.
titles: Breaking down NBA's great tank race for Cooper Flagg as top lottery positions come into focus

title: Safety? Aesthetics? Competitive advantage? The real reasons why some teams want to ban the tush push
snippets: It wasn't just about a polarizing on-field rule. It was a window into the back-channel politics of the rules process.
summary: The discussion surrounding a controversial on-field rule revealed insights into the behind-the-scenes political maneuvers involved in the rules-making process.
titles: Safety? Aesthetics? Competitive advantage? The real reasons why some teams want to ban the tush push

title: Sources: Morant, Hield warned over finger guns
snippets: Grizzlies guard Ja Morant and Warriors guard Buddy Hield were both issued warnings for mimicking shooting a gun during Tuesday's game, sources told ESPN
summary: During Tuesday's game, Grizzlies guard Ja Morant and Warriors guard Buddy Hield received warnings for pretending to shoot a gun, according to ESPN sources.
titles: Sources: Morant, Hield warned over finger guns

title: Sources: Patriots trade QB Milton to Cowboys
snippets: The Patriots are trading quarterback Joe Milton III to the Cowboys, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Thursday.
summary: The New England Patriots have agreed to trade quarterback Joe Milton III to the Dallas Cowboys, according to information from ESPN's Adam Schefter.
titles: Sources: Patriots trade QB Milton to Cowboys

title: Sources: Maxey expected to miss rest of season
snippets: 76ers star Tyrese Maxey is expected to be ruled out for the rest of the season with a finger tendon injury, sources told ESPN.
summary: Tyrese Maxey, a star player for the 76ers, is likely to miss the rest of the season due to a finger tendon injury, according to ESPN sources.
titles: Sources: Maxey expected to miss rest of season

title: US stocks plunge on fears of economic hit from tariffs
snippets: Slump in US dollar is ‘vote of no confidence in Trump’
summary: The US dollar has experienced a decline, which some interpret as a lack of confidence in President Trump's policies.
titles: US stocks plunge on fears of economic hit from tariffs

title: Will Trump’s ‘liberation day’ tariffs drag US into recession?
snippets: President’s move to rip up global trade rule book will hit an economy already losing momentum, say economists
summary: The President's decision to overhaul global trade regulations is expected to negatively impact an economy that is already slowing down, according to economists.
titles: Will Trump’s ‘liberation day’ tariffs drag US into recession?

title: The world’s tiniest nations targeted in Trump’s trade war
snippets: The ‘mountain kingdom’ of Lesotho joins Pacific island Nauru on list of countries hit with punishing US tariffs
summary: Lesotho and Nauru have been added to the list of countries subjected to severe tariffs by the United States. This action marks a significant shift in trade relations with these nations.
titles: The world’s tiniest nations targeted in Trump’s trade war

title: Trump baffles economists with tariff formula
snippets: Calculation deeply flawed economically and will fail in stated aim of ‘driving bilateral trade deficits to zero’, say analysts
summary: Analysts have criticized a calculation for its economic flaws and predict it will not achieve its goal of eliminating bilateral trade deficits.
titles: Trump baffles economists with tariff formula

title: A US tariff pathology is unleashed upon the world
snippets: The Republicans have allowed a destructive economic nationalist to lead America into chaos
summary: The Republicans are criticized for permitting a leader with economic nationalist views to guide the U.S. into a state of disorder.
titles: A US tariff pathology is unleashed upon the world

title: Southern Ocean warming will mean a wetter West Coast, US
snippets: As global temperatures warm, the Southern Ocean -- between Antarctica and other continents -- will eventually release heat absorbed from the atmosphere, leading to projected long-term increases in precipitation over East Asia and the Western U.S., regardless of climate mitigation efforts.
summary: Rising global temperatures will cause the Southern Ocean to release absorbed atmospheric heat, resulting in more rainfall in East Asia and the Western U.S. over the long term, unaffected by climate mitigation strategies.
titles: Southern Ocean warming will mean a wetter West Coast, US

title: Novel point-of-care technology delivers accurate HIV results in minutes
snippets: The technology described uses a nanomechanical platform and tiny cantilevers to detect multiple HIV antigens at high sensitivity in a matter of minutes. These silicon cantilevers are cheap and easy to mass produce and can be readily equipped with a digital readout. Built into a solar-powered device, this technology could be taken to hard-to-reach parts of the world where early detection remains a challenge to deliver fast interventions to vulnerable populations without waiting for a lab.
summary: A new technology employing nanomechanical platforms with silicon cantilevers can detect HIV antigens quickly and sensitively. These cantilevers are inexpensive, easy to produce, and can be integrated with a digital readout. Designed for a solar-powered device, this innovation aims to facilitate early HIV detection in remote areas, offering rapid results without the need for laboratory analysis.
titles: Novel point-of-care technology delivers accurate HIV results in minutes

title: Study finds nearly five-fold increase in hospitalizations for common cause of stroke
snippets: Cervical artery dissection is a tear in an artery in the neck that provides blood flow to the brain. Such a tear can result in blood clots that cause stroke. A new study has found almost a five-fold increase in the number of U.S. hospitalizations for cervical artery dissection over a 15-year period.
summary: A new study reveals a nearly five-fold increase in U.S. hospitalizations for cervical artery dissection, a condition involving a tear in a neck artery leading to the brain, over 15 years. This tear can lead to blood clots and strokes.
titles: Study finds nearly five-fold increase in hospitalizations for common cause of stroke

title: Study reveals how alcohol abuse damages cognition
snippets: For the first time researchers demonstrate in an animal how heavy alcohol use leads to long-term behavioral issues by damaging brain circuits critical for decision-making.
summary: Researchers have for the first time shown in an animal study that heavy alcohol consumption can cause long-term behavioral problems by damaging brain circuits essential for decision-making.
titles: Study reveals how alcohol abuse damages cognition

title: Scientists unveil starfish-inspired wearable tech for heart monitoring
snippets: When we move, it's harder for existing wearable devices to accurately track our heart activity. But researchers found that a starfish's five-arm shape helps solve this problem. Inspired by how a starfish flips itself over -- shrinking one of its arms and using the others in a coordinated motion to right itself -- scientists have created a starfish-shaped wearable device that tracks heart health in real time.
summary: Researchers have developed a starfish-shaped wearable device that improves the tracking of heart activity during movement. This innovation, inspired by the way a starfish moves its arms to flip over, allows for real-time monitoring of heart health by mimicking the starfish's five-arm coordination.
titles: Scientists unveil starfish-inspired wearable tech for heart monitoring
